basics.name: Jane Developer
basics.label: Full-Stack Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer with a passion for building clean, performant web applications. Skilled in modern JavaScript frameworks, cloud infrastructure, and developer tooling.

work.name: Acme Corp
work.summary: Led the migration of a monolithic Rails application to a microservices architecture using Node.js and Kubernetes. Mentored junior developers and established code review standards across the team.

work.name: StartupCo
work.summary: Built and maintained customer-facing features for a SaaS platform serving 50,000 users. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and reduced deployment time by 70%.

work.name: WebAgency
work.summary: Developed responsive websites and web applications for clients across various industries. Gained experience with modern frontend frameworks and RESTful API design.
